name: Minesweeper Class win95
description:
Classic Minesweeper is the best free game which is awarded the five star game by global player. Let's try to play the unique multiplayer mode, use your mind to sweep all the mines! Free, unlimited! Now you can use the free unlimited 3D theme!

Multiplayer Mode:
- Play with the global player in real time.
- To get success by invading the area of opponent.
- Join in the race to improve the ranking and share the best record.
- Login to Facebook and challenge your friend.

Single Mode:
- Divide three level: hard, normal, easy. Newcomers are easy to play.
- To sweep all of mines as soon as possible by changing the dig button and flag button.
- Classic playing method of minesweeper.

Features:
- Classic theme.
- Easy to zoom in and out of the screen.
- Perfectly support the Tablet PC and phone.
- All date are saved in cloud.
- Share to your friend the best record in Facebook.
